metadata.name: Pepe the Mermaid Queen
metadata.description: The painting Pepe the Mermaid Queen shows the depths of the sea waters filled with various magical characters. Fascinating jellyfish, beautiful mermaids and talking crabs are all here. The center of the picture is the conflict between Pepe and the crab "I Know That Feel Bro" with tears in my eyes. Plunge into the depths of the sea with the rays of the sun.
